channel.title: Stairs (delta source 317)
channel.description:
Ok, I was wondering, how do you make the option to go up or down stairs. In Runescape the second story of the lumbridge Castle if you just clicked on the stairs they asked you if you wanted to go up or down. is there a way to do that and also make the context( Right Click) menu one work.
[ul][*]Climb Stairs [*]Climb Up Stairs [*]Climb Down Stairs [*]Examine Stairs [*]Cancel [/list[/ul]

item.title: Stairs (delta source 317)
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:5, topic:337430”]Find the stair/ladder id’s and and the cases in client.java or clickingmost.java
also you have to have the coords for where you want the ladder to take you.[/quote]
I know this but it makes it just up or just down not up or down.

Read full topic

item.title: Stairs (delta source 317)
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

Find the stair/ladder id’s and and the cases in client.java or clickingmost.java
also you have to have the coords for where you want the ladder to take you.

Read full topic

item.description:

Well, if there are already stairs, take their code.

item.title: Stairs (delta source 317)
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

i’ve been using delta scape for a long time and have never had a problem with it i just recently decided to make a huge minigame so i kinda need this and i have a lot coded
into my server (to much to c&p).

Read full topic

item.title: Stairs (delta source 317)
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Well, i don’t know how to help you, but i give you one tip:
If you just began changing delta-scape, adding own things etc., i suggest you to get another source. Really, deltascape sucks, try homiescape, atleast i like that one ^^.

Read full topic

Ok, I was wondering, how do you make the option to go up or down stairs. In Runescape the second story of the lumbridge Castle if you just clicked on the stairs they asked you if you wanted to go up or down. is there a way to do that and also make the context( Right Click) menu one work.
